content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-10.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (-10.0, -50.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-10.5, -48.5) connected to the furnace
- Wooden Chest at position (-8.5, -49.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (-7.5, -49.5) connected to the wooden chest
- Burner Inserter at position (-5.5, -49.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Transport System
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0)
- BeltGroup connecting the mining drill to the furnace with belts at positions:
  - Belt at position (-14.5, -54.5)
  - Belt at position (-13.5, -54.5)
  - Belt at position (-12.5, -54.5)
  - Belt at position (-15.5, -52.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Connecting Belts to Stone Furnace
- Ensure you use an inserter to connect belts to a stone furnace. Belts cannot be directly connected to a stone furnace.

### Errors Due to Lack of Inventory Items
- Before attempting to insert items into an entity, ensure you have the required items in your inventory.

### Low Iron Plate Production
- Investigate the production chain to identify bottlenecks or inefficiencies that may be causing low iron plate output. Consider checking fuel levels, inserter functionality, and resource availability.
